title: Nature Domain
content:
ect up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, yhou can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot.

STR SaveConcentration

Summons a wall of razor-sharp blades that turns the area into Difficult Terrain and damages anyone foolish enough to come close.

18m DEX SaveConcentration

Raise a corpse as a heinous mummy that fights by your sde.

The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.

Reduce a target's maximum hit points, but never below 1.

On Save: Targets still take half damage
